channel.title: Can Someone help me so ranging gives ranged xp and not att,str,def xp?
channel.description: when i range on my server it gives str def or att exp and not range exp.. anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Can Someone help me so ranging gives ranged xp and not att,str,def xp?
item.dc:creator: @mufuka mufuka
item.description:
@mufuka wrote:

nonono i mean ranged the skill… it doesnt give ranged xp it only gives whatever xp u use for like defence or strength or attack in fight menu…

Read full topic

item.source: Can Someone help me so ranging gives ranged xp and not att,str,def xp?

item.title: Can Someone help me so ranging gives ranged xp and not att,str,def xp?
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

search for:

case 2513:

in your client.java

delete all the

addSkillXP

except the one that is for skill # 4.

addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[4]), 4);

(keep this one).

Read full topic
item.source: Can Someone help me so ranging gives ranged xp and not att,str,def xp?
